item.title: Sankey Diagrams and AB Testing
item.description: I have found Sankey diagrams are useful to visualize AB testing (control/treatment groups) or a more complicated funnel. Here’s an example of a super basic funnel. We have a control group and two variants. Here’s something a little more complicated. We have different experience paths each with their own control group and variants.
